snippet: President Obama challenges Republicans to keep taxes low for most Americans, and he’s right on fairness and the facts.
abstract: Editorial offers several points that Pres Obama should make while continuing to push for an end to the Bush-era tax cuts; notes that letting the cuts expire would produce a much-needed $850 billion in revenue over the next 10 years, and that, contrary to the Republican Party line, their impact on small businesses would be negligible.
lead_paragraph: President Obama challenges Republicans to keep taxes low for most Americans, and he’s right on fairness and the facts.

headline.seo: A Challenge on Middle-Class Tax Cuts
headline.main: The Need to Agree to Agree
headline.print_headline: The Need to Agree to Agree
